item.description: Japanese actress who has gained international recognition for portraying Saori Shibuki in the Netflix science fiction thriller drama series Alice in Borderland. She has acted in a variety of Japanese television series and had a leading role in Cutie Honey: The Live. It was her performance in Cutie Honey: The Live that catapulted her to fame in the Japanese acting world. Before Fame She began her entertainment career as a gravure model and variety show participant.

item.title: BPE Compiles List Of Assets To Be Sold, Concessioned
item.description: The Bureau of Public Enterprises has compiled a list of Federal Government assets that would be concessioned. Naija News reports that the latest development is in a bid to fund the 2023 budget. The BPE’s Head of Public Communications, Uzoma Chidi Ibeh, in an interview with PUNCH disclosed the list has been compiled and there was no bidder yet for the assets. According to him, the FG was spending so much money financing many National projects on the list as well as paying staff salaries.

item.title: Buhari'll be Nigeria's president for many years - Governor Ajimobi
item.description: - Governor Abiola Ajimobi of Oyo state said Nigeria is lucky to have President Muhammadu Buhari as president - Speaking at the inauguration of the Ibadan Zonal office of Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC), he said Buhari will be Nigeria's president for many years - He stated that Nigeria needs President Buhari this period more than ever Governor Abiola Ajimobi of Oyo state is optimistic that President Muhammadu Buhari will be Nigeria's president for many years.

item.title: Fellow Actors Confirm Muna Obiekwe's Death
item.description: Muna Obiekwe is dead. Despite lots of rumours and speculations surrounding that tragedy, multiple sources, including TheNation, Linda Ikeji Blog, others confirm that the actor has actually passed away. Many media outlets had reported that the actor had passed away in the afternoon of Sunday, January 18, 2015, in a hospital in Festac, Lagos. However, a couple of hours later several tweets posted on @MunaObiekwe Twitter account returned hope to the hearts of thousands of fans.

item.title: FG Spent N1.8bn To Feed Ondo Pupils In 3 Years
item.description: The Minister of Humanitarian Affairs, Disaster Management and Social Development, Hajiya Sadiya Umar Farouq, has said the Federal Government has spent N1.8bn on the feeding of primary school pupils in Ondo state under the National Home-Grown School Feeding Programme in the last three years. Naija News reports that the school feeding programme is a component of the federal government’s Social Investment Programme. Nneka Anibeze, the Special Assistant on Media to the Minister, disclosed this in a statement issued to journalists in Abuja on Wednesday.

item.title: Gernot Rohr Names Osimhen, Iheanacho, 21 Others In Super Eagles Squad [Full List]
item.description: Super Eagles Technical Adviser, Gernot Rohr, has invited Napoli striker, Victor Osimhen, Moses Simon and Leicester City’s Kelechi Iheanacho ahead of FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 double qualifying clash against the Central African Republic in Lagos and Douala. The Franco-German also invited captain Ahmed Musa and deputy captain William Ekong. Goalkeepers Maduka Okoye, Francis Uzoho and Daniel Akpeyi return, just as defenders William Ekong, Abdullahi Shehu, Chidozie Awaziem, Leon Balogun, Jamilu Collins, Olaoluwa Aina and Kenneth Omeruo.

item.title: How Nollywood Actress, Rita Dominic Turned Caregiver In London
item.description: Veteran Nollywood actress, Rita Dominic, has opened up about how she momentarily stopped acting and moved to London. Naija News reports that the thespian made this known in a video making the rounds online, stating that 2001 and 2002 were dark moments in her life. According to Rita, she needed to leave the movie industry due to certain issues with some friends and family. The movie star said she gave up fame when she moved to London and became a caregiver to make ends meet.

item.title: How to Get the Dune 2 Popcorn Bucket Which Became a Meme
item.description: The 'Dune: Part Two' Popcorn Bucket Is the First Great Meme of 2024 — Here's How to Get OneBy Callie (Carlos) CadornigaJan. 26 2024, Published 11:23 a.m. ET Source: Twitter/@3CFilmsAmid an uncertain box-office era quite literally plagued by a global pandemic, Dune managed to do the improbable in 2021 by becoming a box-office success during a time when people were avoiding movie theaters altogether. Based on Frank Hebert's acclaimed sci-fi novel of the same name, the film follows Paul Atreides (Timothée Chalamet) as he attempts to survive warfare on an unforgiving desert planet.

item.title: Is Clayton Echard Single Now? Where the Bachelor Stands After the Finale
item.description: The Truth About Clayton Echard's Current Relationship StatusBy Pretty HonoreUpdated March 15 2022, 11:25 p.m. ET Source: ABCWarning: This article contains major spoilers about The Bachelor Season 16 finale. Season 26 of The Bachelor quickly went from an emotional rollercoaster to a full-blown trainwreck in the first part of the four-hour finale. After several weeks of eliminations, Susie Evans, Rachel Recchia, and Gabby Windey were the last three women standing. While Susie eliminated herself after the fantasy suite fiasco, she decided to (or more like producers convinced her to) stick around in Iceland and have a conversation with Clayton.

item.title: Judah Lewis - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Breaking out in the part of Chris Moreno in the 2015 film Demolition, he'd later be cast in the lead role in the 2017 horror film The Babysitter. He had a minor role in the 2015 reboot of Point Break and starred as Teddy Pierce in Netflix's The Christmas Chronicles in 2018. Before Fame He began acting on stage when he was just four years old. His played Caleb Barlow in the 2014 TV movie Deliverance Creek.

item.title: Kaela Tucker - Age, Family, Bio
Live Updates, Situation Reports And Results
item.description: The By-election is being held today, Saturday, 12th of November, 2020 in Lagos East senatorial district to replace the vacant seat created by the death of senator Adebayo Osinowo in June this year. Mr Babatunde Gbadamosi of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) and Mr Tokunbo Abiru of the All Progressives Congress (APC) are the major contenders in the election. The election will be held across five local government areas (LGAs)  and eleven local council development areas LCDA’s.

item.title: Lupita Jones - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Miss Universe 1991 who was the first ever Mexican woman to win that title. Before Fame She breezed through the final round of the Miss Universe competition, scoring among the top in every category: swimsuit, evening gown and interview. Trivia She used her newfound fame to organize the Nuestra Belleza México, that official pageant that would choose the country's entrant to the Miss Universe contest. Family Life She was born in Mexicali, Baja California, near the American border.

item.title: Murder Of Newlywed: Ugos Friend Has Questions To Answer Police
item.description: As the murder of newly-wed, Ugochukwu Ozuah remains a mystery, the police in Lagos yesterday declared that Mr. Irikefe Omene, the friend who the deceased was seeing-off when he was fatally shot has questions to answer. The Ozuah family had accused policemen of being responsible for the killing, but the police had dismissed the allegation as flawed, absolving their men of complicity. Lagos State Police Public Relations Officer, Mrs. Ngozi Braide told Daily Sun that Omene traveled out of the country only 48 hours after the incident, adding that he was needed to answer questions as the sole witness to Ugochukwu’s killing.

item.title: Nicknames Nigerians call 13 state governors
item.description: Nigerians are a great people and they have a funny way of naming things and people. They have a name for everything under the sun. For example, they call motorcycles, Okada. They are very good at giving nicknames to things and even humans. The nicknames they give to people are usually as a result of something, maybe an event. Most of the time, these nicknames eventually replace the real names.

item.title: NNPP BoT Suspends Kwankwaso Over Alleged Anti-party Activities
item.description: The Board of Trustees (BoT) of the New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP) has suspended the party’s National leader and 2023 presidential candidate, Senator Rabiu Kwankwaso, for six months for alleged anti-party activities. The suspension of Kwankwaso was announced on Tuesday at the end of a parallel National Executive Committee (NEC) meeting held in Lagos State. Secretary of the BoT, Babayo Muhammed Abdullahi, while addressing journalists at the end of the meeting said the BoT also suspended the National Working Committee (NWC) of the party.

item.title: Oscar Predictions for 2020 Our Best Guesses for Next Years Noms
item.description: The Oscar Buzz Is Real — Here Are Our Oscar Predictions for 2020By Abi TravisUpdated Dec. 2 2019, 2:44 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIt’s that time of year again! Time to see all those movies you’ve been meaning to see all year and make your Oscar predictions for 2020. The official nominees won’t be announced until Jan. 13, 2020, but we don’t need to wait until then to start compiling our list, right?

item.title: Pauley Perrette - Age, Family, Bio
People Share Their Worst Misheard Lyrics and It's Too Hilarious
item.description: We've all misheard a lyric or two. People are sharing their worst one in an epic and hilarious Twitter thread. Source: NBC / TwitterI don't know why, but when my siblings and I would belt out to The Lion King soundtrack when we were little kids, we'd sing "Can You Feel the Fluff Tonight?" at the top of our lungs. Did we actually think the Disney movie starring cartoon lions had a whole song dedicated to the texture of spreadable marshmallow?

item.title: Phaedra Parks and Apollo Nidas Relationship Timeline Revealed
item.description: Phaedra Parks and Apollo Nida Dated On and Off Before ‘RHOA’ — Their Relationship TimelineBy Elizabeth RandolphAug. 29 2022, Published 10:50 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesAfter working as a high-profile attorney for stars like Bobby Brown and Michael Jackson, Phaedra Parks accepted her peach on The Real Housewives of Atlanta. From the beginning, many viewers became entranced by the self-proclaimed “Southern Belle’s” wit, humor, and ability to read her co-stars at the drop of a hat.

item.title: Queens Behind the Scenes: Kemi Adetiba, 6 Other Female Directors Redefining Filmmaking in Nollywood
item.description: The Nigerian film industry has for many years, kept millions of movie lovers entertained, and is no doubt responsible for the fame and fortune of many celebrities today. Interestingly, more women are getting involved in filmmaking and it isn't just in front of the screen. Several years ago, female producers and directors weren't so many in the industry as the technical aspect of movie-making was mostly male-dominated. item.title: The New York Yankees' Strict Shaving Policy Has Been Enforced for Decades but Why?
item.description: Why do New York Yankees players have to shave their facial hair? Where does the rule originate? Team players have been doing it since the 1970s. Source: Getty ImagesDespite being one of the major powerhouses of the MLB, the New York Yankees organization still harbors a few pretty dated policies within its ranks. One policy that seems to stick out to many fans — as it affects how the entire team looks — is the one regarding how players have to shave their faces.

item.title: What Multiplayer Options Are in 'Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga'?
item.description: The 'Lego Star Wars' games aren't known for expansive multiplayer options, but can you play co-op style in 'The Skywalker Saga'? April 5 marks the release of the newest Lego Star Wars game, The Skywalker Saga. Explore all nine chapters of the entire Star Wars saga, and you can pick whichever trilogy you wish to start with — which does mean you can play them all in release order the way the Star Wars saga is meant to be experienced.

item.title: What Was Paul Grant's Cause of Death? Actor Died at 56
item.description: 'Star Wars' and 'Harry Potter' Actor Paul Grant Has Died at Age 56By Allison DeGrusheMar. 21 2023, Published 9:48 a.m. ET Source: FacebookBritish actor and stuntman Paul Grant, best known for his roles in Star Wars: Return of the Jedi and Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, has sadly passed away. He was 56 years old. What happened? Here's what we know about Paul Grant's cause of death. Source: 20th Century FoxPaul Grant played an ewok in 'Star Wars: Return of the Jedi.

item.title: Woman Says She's Tired of Attracting Republicans, Updates Her Hinge Profile to Keep Them Away
item.description: In a viral video, a young woman revealed she added a "no Republicans" message to her Hinge profile. Read on to find out how some users responded. Source: TikTok / @ameliahwhiteLet's face it — dating is hard in this day and age. It's impossible to meet someone "the old-fashioned way," and every single dating app turns people off so much that they don't even want to bother with dating anymore.
